title: 19th Century (French) Typefaces
content:
Hi guys,

Can someone please point me towards typefaces imitating (or close-ish to) those found in the 19th Century - particularly those of France (and Europe).

I'm looking for serif typefaces than can be used for body text and headings, not script fonts. H&FJ have a couple of nice ones, but I would like to look around before deciding what to purchase.

Absolute accuracy to period is not vital - just something approximating it...

Many thanks,

Martin
author: BleedingEdge
